name: Aave Flashloan Folding
description: Supplies and borrows {{token}} on [Aave](https://app.aave.com/markets) simultaneously to earn stkAAVE. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy. Flashloans are used to obtain additional {{token}} from [dYdX](https://margin.dydx.exchange/markets/overview) to boost the APY.
